history.proof: intros Q p q Hred Hcanon HeqP. induction Hred. hauto use: CombLinear_reduceplus, CombLinear_0, eqp_inv2 unfold: pO.

original: intros Q p q Hred Hcanon HeqP. induction Hred. * apply CombLinear_0. * apply CombLinear_1 with (pluspf A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec ltM ltM_dec (mults multA a q) p). + unfold not. intros. apply H. apply Hred. + auto. + apply IHHred. * apply CombLinear_1 with (pluspf A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec ltM ltM_dec (mults multA a q) p). + unfold not. intros. apply H. apply Hred. + auto. + apply IHHred.
